GPUAdapterRequestDevice.summary:
The requestDevice() method of the
interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills with a object, which is the primary interface for communicating with the GPU.
GPUAdapterRequestDevice.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills with a object instance.If you make a duplicate call, i.e. call requestDevice() on a that requestDevice() was already called on, the promise fulfills with a device that is immediately lost. You can then get information on how the device was lost via .
